transcript: - Hey guys, it's Justine and today we're gonna be unboxing something that will help you clean your house. Robots! (upbeat music) So I have the iRobot Roomba and the iRobot Braava jet. My sister actually has this one and she has been saying how amazing it is, so I'm really excited to check it out. A huge thank you to iRobot for sponsoring this video. I cannot wait to have a clean house. I have purposely been not cleaning the floors, I mean, I'm saying purposely, but just like, I really just haven't actually cleaned them. So this is going to be great because there's a lot of dirt all over the place, but don't worry. We're also gonna show you how it can disappear very quickly. Let's unbox. (upbeat music) It's been a while since I've been this super excited to unbox something. I mean, I do unbox a lot of stuff, but this is gonna help me keep my life in order and clean. Oh, this is its base station. (cardboard box shuffling) The real question is what are we gonna name it? (cardboard box shuffling) Seriously really exciting. I was spending so much more time at home and to be able to have sort of the heavily trafficked areas clean consistently throughout the day, especially the entrance to my little backyard area because the dog is constantly in and out of there all day long. So this will be able to know my high trafficked areas and take care of it for me. I wonder if you make a good dinner companion, how's your conversational skills. Mine are pretty poor. Look at this. Let's get it set up, and then I'll unbox the Braava jet while this is charging. (upbeat electronic music) Okay. Braava jet. (cardboard box shuffling) Oh, look at you. This is really sleek looking and we've got the base station. Cables, oh, look at this. This is a washable wet mopping pad. And here's a couple of the single use wet mopping pads, here's a sweeping pad, so we have a sweeping pad, a mopping pad and a washable. Now we need to find a home for this, and then we're gonna set up the app and get these all synced up so we can start some cleaning. (calm electronic music) So I've read all my directions, I have the app downloaded, these guys are all plugged in, and now it's time to set them up. Let's set up the vacuum. Let's name it Roomba Mama, press and hold spot and home spot and home. Okay. (electronic ding) I've pressed the buttons, (gasps), set up is complete. "Welcome to the world, Roomba Mama." This is the best thing I've ever seen in my life. Maddie, please, we're doing a software update. Get hyped. So the update for the Roomba Mama is ready. So this is just about ready to clean, I'm gonna set up the mop, then start this clean while this charges, it's all a process, but this is gonna be great, because once these are all set up, everything will basically be automated, and I won't have to really do anything. What should we name this one? How about Baby Braava? (gasps) There we go. (electronic ding) (gasps) Connect to my wifi. Once baby Braava is connected to your wifi, I love these names (laughs). This is the best part about it. That's interesting. So depending upon which pad you install into the Braava jet, it'll automatically put it in that mode. There's different automations that you can set your robots up to do, so you can actually have it set up so that when you leave the house, the robots will know that you're no longer here and they'll start cleaning so that you can return home to a clean house. I also love that this has integration with Alexa and Google, I can, I'm like, I always bring my voice down, like, so they can't hear me. She heard me, she already heard me. So with that integration, you'll be able to communicate with your voice through those devices, to have them clean a specific room or just clean the house. So we're about to do our first clean, and this has no map data of my house. So we need to do this first clean so that it's able to kind of get its bearings. So first thing's first Roomba Mama, let's get this party started. (electronic musical signal) (Roomba whirring) This is your first time! (electronic music) It's learning, it's learning! (calm electronic music) I love that he's like not even afraid of it. He's like, "All right." (electronic music) I have a busy schedule and then I also have a dog who frequently tracks in dirt and makes a lot of messes. I can easily set a schedule so they can clean specific rooms on certain days, or just clean every room, with imprint link technology, Roomba and Braava jet are able to mop my home and clean without me having to do anything. It's really cool because it's able to imprint smart mapping to be able to learn its way around my home. I do have two floors in my house. So this could also learn my upstairs as well as the downstairs. You can choose a room to be cleaned in the app and you can also use smart home integration with Amazon Alexa and Google. Roomba clean my kitchen! I love that you can make keep out zones, these are virtual boundaries so I can make sure that my dogs, food, and water dishes are off limits. You can also add clean zones for a place that might frequently need cleaning like the kitchen island or the front door. There's an all new updated app that lets you build out your own map and customize it with room dividers, labels and zones. You can also add favorites, so with one tap, you'll be able to clean your preferred room or highly trafficked areas. It's also always learning your space and it keeps evolving the more you use it. (electronic music) I'm so entertained, I've been watching this thing the whole time. It's navigating around everything, like, it found its way out of so many obstacles, it went under the couch, and then came back out. It made its way around the garbage can. I went upstairs to play video games, and then I got a notification that said "Roomba Mama was completed."
